duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform radiographic procedures and critique radiographs to ensure high-quality images.
Apply the principles of radiation safety during the process of acquiring radiographic images.
Facilitate and coordinate imaging support in the operating room, patient care units, and clinics.
Assess patient vital signs and conditions when indicated during procedures.
Report equipment malfunctions to appropriate personnel and service entity.
Assist in orienting, training, and mentoring new employees or students on department workflow, practices, policies, and procedures.
Prepare, clean, and stock rooms with supplies and linens.

education_certification.credential: Current RQI Healthcare Provider eCredential through the University of Utah Health RQI system.
Current licensure to practice as a Radiologic Technologist in the State of Utah.
ARRT Registration as a Radiologic Technician R.T. ( R) (ARRT).* Additional license requirements as determined by the hiring department.
